name: 1 - Delivery of imported general purpose topsoil
• HP: At least 7 days prior to delivery, a statement signed by you verifying that the topsoil complies with specified requirements.
• The Principal will consider the submitted documents and may inspect the test records prior to authorising the release of the Hold Point.
• WP: Notify Principal, not less than 2 working days prior to the intended time of applying fertiliser, that the unopened bags or containers of fertiliser are available for inspection on Site.
3 - Use of seed pre-treated off site
• HP: At least 3 working days prior to delivery, submit the accompanying certificate showing the species, variety, weight and place of pre-treatment.
• The Principal will consider the submitted documents and may inspect the seed prior to authorising the release of the Hold Point.
QA ENGINEER / SPE / PE SIGN OFF
